title: Cape, ca. 1845
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on gauze
creditline: Gift of Mrs. William P. Treadwell
description: Short shoulder cape of cotton gauze. Printed design shows an allover white and purple leaf pattern on a black ground. Edged with a double ruffle.
